column1: Smoque BBQ////Overall Smoque is a filling and fair priced meal.  Their BBQ sauce is very good
column2: and you everything here really is homemade.  Its a very informal setting and the only small issue is that the place can get VERY crowded around peak meal times
column3: but that's usually the case with any good food establishment.  They don't have a ton of parking
column4: but it's not hard to find a decent spot around the restaurant.
